hero.title: About
hero.text: Digtal Open Learning is an idea. To make sense of Digital in a Human way. Digital transformation isn't about technology alone. It's cultural and human. Let's build awareness of possibilities, increase confidence and capacity of government employees together. Explore below to find curated and personalized learning opportunities

dolcard.title: Digital Open Learning
dolcard.text: DOL presents the digital transformation of the Canadian government and its services in human terms because digital transformation is fundamentally cultural. The focus of the foundational learning offerings are designed to build awareness of possibilities, increase confidence and capacity of government employees who are navigating the impacts of digital on their world. Additionally, digital foundations piques the interest to learn more through curated and personalized learning opportunities.

text.li1: Public servants (learners) engage in new ways of thinking about themselves, their work and the role of government in providing better services to citizens;
text.li2: Learners improve their knowledge and skills through easy to consume, timely and relevant content related to digital in government
text.li3: Learners improve their understanding of digital through connections to deeper learning activities

explorecard.title: Explore DOL
explorecard.text: DOL has a curated catalogue of Digital Learning Resources. Explore them furhter by Stream, Practice, and more. When you find something you want to know more about, add it to your profile so you can track your learning.

description.part1: To get started, edit src/App.js and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.
